news_header: Tampere has attracted numerous foreign companies' product development units, including Glass Imaging, which aims to enhance phone camera quality using AI.
news_text: In recent years, Tampere has seen the establishment of many foreign companies’ product development units, thanks to its strong engineering tradition. The Nokia Communicator was a significant innovation in the late 1990s, marking Tampere as a hub for digital imaging and mobile technology. Recently, Glass Imaging, a company focused on artificial intelligence and founded by former Apple engineers, opened an office in Tampere. This reflects the city's ability to attract numerous foreign enterprises, including major players like Microsoft and Amazon. Glass Imaging aims to improve phone camera image quality to rival that of professional cameras, leveraging local expertise in optical design, computational imaging, and deep learning.
